semantic_description: Add OpenTelemetry RabbitMQ instrumentation to the clm-web service so that publish/consume spans appear in Jaeger with the expected messaging.* attributes.

attributes_to_add.name: messaging.operation
attributes_to_add.value_source: the literal string 'publish' for producer spans and 'receive' for consumer spans

attributes_to_add.name: environment
attributes_to_add.value_source: the application configuration value indicating environment (e.g., 'Production')
